attributes.action: Prohibit slow moving vehicles from dual carriageways during rush hour!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On two lane Dual Carraigeways, a slow moving vehicle such as a Tractor or JCB has the effect of causing every vehicle to move into the outside lane to pass it. During rush hour this then causes a large tail back of slow moving traffic. We would like to have the times that these vehicles can use a Dual Carriageway restricted so that these delays are not caused.
